application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Planned workLaurel (T1) - crown reduceReduce height by 1m from 6m to 5m and lateral spread by 2m from 4m to 2m.  Reduction to shape canopy, pruning to suitable points and maintaining natural aesthetic. Work undertaken to bring back to form and improve light conditions for both owner and neighboring properties.  The canopy overhangs the pavement so work will be undertaken to prevent future issues.The tree will tolerate the pruning as specified above.Holly (T2) - fellTree of approximately 6m in heightThere are too many trees in the garden and the removal will allow other flora to flourish.Willow (T3 & T4) - crown reduceReduce height by 2m from 9m to 7m and lateral spread by 2m from 7m to 5m.  Reduction to shape canopy, pruning to suitable points and maintaining natural aesthetic. Work undertaken to bring back to form and improve light conditions for both owner and neighboring properties.  The tree will tolerate the pruning as specified above.Oak (T5) - lateral reductionTree of approximately 12m in height.  Reduce lateral spread by 3m from 8m to 5m and lift to 4m above ground level.  Reduction to shape canopy, pruning to suitable points and maintaining natural aesthetic.  Work undertaken to bring back to form and improve light conditions in the owner's garden..  The tree will tolerate the pruning as specified above.Bay (T6 & T7) - crown reduceReduce height by 1m from 4m to 3m and lateral spread by 1m from 3m to 2m.  Reduction to shape canopy, pruning to suitable points and maintaining natural aesthetic. Work undertaken to bring back to form and improve light conditions for both owner and neighboring properties.  The tree will tolerate the pruning as specified above.
